title: Tour -isms
content:
Since I’m living in Europe now, I thought it would be good to tour everywhere in Europe, and get to know it better.

I’m not into seeing the sights. I don’t take photos. What I want is to get to know the mindset, the world-view of each place. The philosophy.

So I wondered if there’s a way to tour philosophies directly. What if, instead of touring places, we toured ideas? Can I tour the “-ism”s?

My collection of Very Short Introduction books includes:

  • Abolitionism
  • Agnosticism
  • Anarchism
  • Anglicanism
  • Antisemitism
  • Atheism
  • Buddhism
  • Calvinism
  • Capitalism
  • Catholicism
  • Communism
  • Confucianism
  • Epicureanism
  • Existentialism
  • Fascism
  • Feminism
  • Fundamentalism
  • Hinduism
  • Humanism
  • Judaism
  • Liberalism
  • Methodism
  • Modernism
  • Monasticism
  • Mormonism
  • Multiculturalism
  • Nationalism
  • Neoliberalism
  • Paganism
  • Pentecostalism
  • Populism
  • Post-colonialism
  • Post-modernism
  • Post-structuralism
  • Progressivism
  • Protestantism
  • Puritanism
  • Racism
  • Romanticism
  • Scepticism
  • Secularism
  • Sikhism
  • Socialism
  • Stoicism
  • Surrealism
  • Terrorism
  • Utopianism
  • Zionism

Now that’s my kind of tourism!
author: Derek Sivers
